com.github.fge.jsonschema.util.jackson

Class JacksonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.jsonschema.util.jackson.JacksonUtils

  • public final class JacksonUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for Jackson

    This class provides a custom JsonNodeFactory and ObjectMapper which you should use preferably to your own (in particular, the mapper ensures that decimal values are read using BigDecimal.

    It also provides a method for returning an empty ObjectNode (for all practical purposes, an empty schema), and one to convert a JSON object into a Map.

      • asMap

        public static Map<String,JsonNode> asMap(JsonNode node)
        Return a map out of an object's members

        If the node given as an argument is not a map, an empty map is returned.

        Parameters:
        node - the node
        Returns:
        a map
